effects: You always have the spells in the War Domain Spells table prepared at the cleric levels shown.
You can make one weapon or unarmed strike as a bonus action.
limits: You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

feature_defs.trigger: when you or a creature within 30 feet misses with an attack roll
effects: You grant +10 to the attack roll, potentially causing it to hit.
limits: Cost: expend one use of Channel Divinity.

feature_defs.trigger: when you cast Shield of Faith or Spiritual Weapon using Channel Divinity
effects: You can cast Shield of Faith or Spiritual Weapon without expending a spell slot; it doesn’t require concentration and lasts 1 minute.
limits: Ends early if you cast the spell again, are Incapacitated, or die.
